tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE circulation (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    newspaper_name VARCHAR(255),
    magazine_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity_distributed INT,
    delivery_schedule VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE quantities_distributed (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT,
  newspaper_quantity INT,
  magazine_quantity INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES distribution_routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_schedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  distribution_id INT,
  delivery_date DATE,
  delivery_time TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (distribution_id) REFERENCES quantities_distributed(distribution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE newspaper_distribution (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  newspaper_id INT NOT NULL,
  route_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity_distributed INT NOT NULL,
  distribution_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES circulation_route(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE magazine_distribution (
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  magazine_id INT NOT NULL,
  route_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity_distributed INT NOT NULL,
  distribution_date DATE NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES circulation_route(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE delivery_schedule (
  delivery_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  route_id INT NOT NULL,
  delivery_time TIME NOT NULL,
  delivery_day VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES circulation_route(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE distribution ( 
  distribution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_id INT NOT NULL,
  route_id INT NOT NULL,
  quantity_distributed INT NOT NULL,
  distribution_date DATE NOT NULL
);
